column2: Has a §YFriend§!, §YSpouse§!, §YConcubine§!, §YConsort§! or §YLover§! who follows the [GetWLCanJoinReligion], or has a §YHoly Site§! of the [GetWLCanJoinReligion] in their demesne
Embraces their membership of a respected legendary hero's bloodline
Embraces their membership of a respected contemporary bloodline
Embraces their membership of a respected historical bloodline
